ygData.subject: rivervale quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The quest is still there. They just moved the Deputy into Misty so he was a zone away. Its a shame they did this because the cheat describe above was
ygData.messageBody:
> the person who
> gave the quest, and then died. Someone standing next to the
> person who gave
> the quest would then hail the guard locking him in place.
> You then could
> receive the quest, and give the item to the guard gaining xp
> and faction.
> People went from first to 12th level like this in a matter of
> hours before
> being banned. It's possible though unlikely this quest (Or
> any quest like
> it) is still in the game.


The quest is still there. They just moved the Deputy into Misty so he was a
zone away. Its a shame they did this because the cheat describe above was
abusive and childish. The Deputy was not uncommon and it was VERY easy to do
this quest over and over again without dragging him to the guy that gave the
quest. It was a great way to improve faction and get lots of experience
quickly. Once they did this stupid dragging trick (which really gained them
nothing, you could hail him and lock him in place without doing this) the
easy quick part went away. I have no problem with using things to our
advantage, but this trick was unnecessary and cost all of us a great easy
power leveling quest for youngsters.

=(
